extends java.lang.Object

      • handleSafe

        @NotNull
public <T,R> @NotNull Exceptional<R> handleSafe(@NotNull
                                                          @NotNull java.util.function.Function<T,R> function,
                                                          T value)
        Description copied from interface: ExceptionHelper
        Runs a given function accepting a given value, returning a potential result wrapped in a [org.dockbox.selene.core.objects.Exceptional]. The exceptional should wrap the exception if present. Handles any possible exceptions using default behavior for the implementation. Usually this will be logging to a console or file.
        Specified by:
        handleSafe in interface ExceptionHelper
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the value to be consumed
        R - The return type to be wrapped in Exceptional
        Parameters:
        function - The function to use
        value - The value to apply to
        Returns:
        The exceptional holding either the return type or an exception
